subject: Steroids
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Marreros can only try to understand the whole crazy system of athletes and local suppliers who provided their son Efrain with steroids, before he obediently went off the stuff and killed himself at 19.
snippet: The Marreros can only try to understand the whole crazy system of athletes and local suppliers who provided their son Efrain with steroids, before he obediently went off the stuff and killed himself at 19.
